section 1
id data_09-04-2020/fold5/train/09-02-2020-1210.5836v1.Accelerating_the_switching_of_logical_units_by_anisotropy_driven_magnetization_dynamics.pdf.json

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold5/train/29-01-2020-part2-1810.05209v1.Factors_controlling_oxygen_interstitial_diffusion_in_the_Ruddlesden_Popper_oxide_La2_xSrxNiO4_delta.pdf.json

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold5/train/04-09-2019-paper-23.pdf.json

theoretical O

of O
structural O
, O
elastic O
, O

and O

of O
the O

INTRODUCTION O
